item.title: How do i change shop prices
item.dc:creator: @CrossShot CrossShot
item.description:
@CrossShot wrote:

johno2:

You need to change the prices client side.

Yh but how? we both tried to follow this by going into “Shops.cfg”:

ShopID - The number of the shop (this is where ‘wanneshop = **’ in client.java comes into play).
ShopName- Name your shop
Sell - This is were it’s a tad of a trick, by typing either 1 or 0, you’ll enable the shop to either sell items it’s already got stocked, or any items a player previously sold to the store.
Buy - Same as above. 1 is to allow shops to buy/sell any items, 0 is to make it so shops can only buy/sell what they’re originally stocked with.
Item - ID of an item to sell.
Amount - How much to sell the previous ItemID for.

But anytime we change the “Amount” it doesn’t change the prices in the shops…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change shop prices
item.dc:creator: @skb skb
item.description:
@skb wrote:

in shops.cfg it goes like this

//-----ShopID—ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item----Amount–Item
shop = 39 Magic store 0 0 2415 10000 2416 100002417 10000 4091 10000 4089 10000

say it was all lined up and stuff, i go ingame and the guy is selling 10k of the item which is the above amount ^^^, how to i change the price of the items in the shop

Read full topic
